presentationColumns.name: Transaction Debit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the debit amount for the transactions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cost Accounting.Transaction Debit Amount

presentationColumns.name: Transaction Credit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the credit amount for the transactions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cost Accounting.Transaction Credit Amount

presentationColumns.name: Transaction Net Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the transactions. Where activity amount = Sum of debit amount - Sum of credit amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cost Accounting.Transaction Net Amount
